name: Delver (itch) (ealleytm)
description:
A short level design demo made in Unreal Engine 5.  Fight off the Grundmin attacking your floating town!

Standard third person controls - Controller or KBM

R Click/Trigger - Magic attack

L Click/Trigger - Melee attack

Music and SFX from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com and https://mixkit.co/
